column4: How do I change associations for Nautilus? I don't want it to use totem for opening anything. I hate totem, it can't play anything. not even mp3. so why associate with it automatically??
select a file, under properties for that file. you can pick the default app for it.
this is liunx. use what you like.. Install the proper codecs and totem can play the other files.
how do I install codecs for totem? I did apt-get install mplayer and it plays everything
